original: Zachrisson, Bruno, disponent, boktryckare, Göteborg, f. 15/7/90 i Gbg av boktr. Waldemar Z. o. Beda Carlberg. G. 16 m. Elsa Lillienau. Barn: Tor, Per-Olof, Karin, Gösta. — Stud:-ex. 09, yrkesstud. i Wien 09, i Magde-burg 10-11 o. i Bradford 11. Anst. h. Wezäta 11, v. dir. där 20 o. verkst. dir. 24-40, disp. i Esseltes Gbgsind. A-B o. Wezäta-Gbgslitogr. A-B. Sekr. f. int. boktr :kongr. i Gbg 23, led. av Sv. mässans styr. o. verkst. nd. Led. av styr. f. Gbgs Golvkl. o. f. Gbgs o. Bohusl. turisttrafikfören.
translated: Zachrisson, Bruno, manager, printer, Gothenburg, b. 15/7/90 in Gothenburg, son of printer Waldemar Z. and Beda Carlberg. Married on 16 to Elsa Lillienau. Children: Tor, Per-Olof, Karin, Gösta. — High school diploma in 09, vocational studies in Vienna in 09, Magdeburg in 10-11, and in Bradford in 11. Employed at Wezäta in 11, deputy director there in 20 and executive director in 24-40. Disponent at Esseltes Gbgsind. A-B and Wezäta-Gbgslitogr. A-B. Secretary for the International Printing Congress in Gothenburg in 23, member of the Board of the Swedish Fair and Executive Committee. Member of the Board for Gothenburg Floor Club and the Gothenburg and Bohuslän Tourist Traffic Association.

memberOf.name: Gothenburg and Bohuslän Tourist Traffic Association
